last_episode_to_air.name: Ascension
last_episode_to_air.overview: Citizens of the Dominion must come together to face their greatest threat yet. Rose and Lissa make a fateful decision.

name: Vampire Academy
overview: In a world of privilege and glamour, two young women’s friendship transcends their strikingly different classes as they prepare to complete their education and enter royal vampire society. Based on the young adult novels by Richelle Mead.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: With their lives upended by tragedy, Rose's place is uncertain as Lissa faces a new role in court.

episodes.name: Earth. Air. Water. Fire.
episodes.overview: Lissa fears the world will learn her secret; Rose must face the consequences of her actions.

episodes.name: Death Watch
episodes.overview: The Dominion suffers a great loss; Rose meets her match; Christian receives shocking news.

episodes.name: Benchmark
episodes.overview: Rose faces a defining test as a Guardian; Victor offers Lissa a chance to improve the Dominion.

episodes.name: Near Guard, Far Guard
episodes.overview: Rose proves she’s a great leader, but at a terrible cost. Lissa takes matters into her own hands.

episodes.name: Molnija
episodes.overview: On the royal tour, Rose tries to find peace; Lissa seeks answers about her magic.

episodes.name: Beyond The Wards
episodes.overview: Rose and Lissa's quest for answers leads them beyond the borders of the world they've always known.

episodes.name: The Trials
episodes.overview: The fight for the throne comes to a head; Victor hides his secret; Rose investigates the enemy.

episodes.name: Darkness
episodes.overview: The aftermath of the Trials throws the Dominion into chaos; Christian faces a horrific truth.

episodes.name: Ascension
episodes.overview: Citizens of the Dominion must come together to face their greatest threat yet. Rose and Lissa make a fateful decision.
